main event: A bright light was observed flashing up and down near West Point, Kentucky on January 22, 1954.
interesting points: The light resembled a spotlight,The sighting lasted for 25 minutes,The observer was a household wife and an apprentice electrician,There were no other witnesses to the event,The object was not detected on radar.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: a housewife and an apprentice electrician
